message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's worth sharing. We are offering this remarkable product to you for $1,200,000. We understand the importance of such an investment and aim to ensure it meets all your expectations.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $1,200,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for it. This would still be a profitable deal for you, as it's significantly more than what you value it at.
